title: Poro King's Treasure chest
body: I was wondering if I never open my poro kings chest will it disappear like the rest of the snowdown stuff like the snowdown sweets and I assume the fragments to the chest. so I was wondering if the chest disappears aswell

replies.body:
The [**Snowdown 2016 Crafting Guide**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/snowdown-crafting-2016) doesn't specifically mention that ALL Snowdown loot expires, but it mentions that emotes and snowdown sweets expire *on January 16, 2017 at 23:59 PT.* I **strongly recommend** using all snowdown loot before that date, *just in case* the rest of the loot is removed on this day as well.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
